title: One problem
text:
I use Uber occasionally and am generally very pleased. But the thing I have dreaded has finally happened (for St. Pat’s Day 2024): Uber has used Notifications to send ads!
   I’ve got notifications turned on for Uber. For sure, when I’m using the app I’ve got to have complete communication with the driver at all times. And I don’t want to remember at airport in Cold with bags to turn notifications on or off!
   But ads??? If companies start using notifications more and more for That, then you can see the nightmare. I’ll get totally hammered with unnecessary junk. 
   Please Uber bosses, cut out that “new feature.” Have mercy!

title: Charging me extra for nothing
text:
Uber always charge me extra for rides but never come to the right address to pick me up. I write Uber every day two times a day and it’s terrible that they would charge me extra and don’t come to the right address. I’m switching over to Lyft because this is crazy, I put the right address in and it come to the wrong address. My address is 8200 S. Christiana and they come around the corner and then when I don’t see them around the corner, they charge me extra and it’s not right and it’s not fair. I got a Uber to go to and to come home from Aldi‘s. The man was sitting in the parking lot at McDonald’s waiting for me and I’m at Aldi‘s. This is ridiculous. I don’t think that is fair today they came and picked me up from Marianos and they charge they wanted to charge me extra and say I wasn’t there for my trip but I was I was standing outside but the man 
 the Uber driver was so long put my code in and it’s ridiculous

title: Uber Black Canceled Me
text: My Uber black cancels my ride 3 minutes before pickup time that I ordered almost 2 hours before my pick up time. The. The app automatically lets another driver pick up my ride which is not a big deal, but that would put my pickup time 15 minutes later than we ar supposed to be picked up which would have made it impossible for us to make our dinner reservation. So I canceled the ride. What’s UBER do….charges me anyway. Even thoug I booked the ride in advance and because the first dodger waited 3 minutes before pick up time to cancel. Normally I wouldn’t worry about the money and to be truthful I don’t want the money back, but I’m sick and tired of terrible service being rewarded.
